name: Node.isConnected
description: The isConnected read-only property of the Node interface returns a boolean indicating whether the node is connected (directly or indirectly) to the context object, for example the Document object in the case of the normal DOM, or the ShadowRoot in the case of a shadow DOM.

refs.name: DOM
refs.description: The definition of 'isConnected' in the 'DOM' specification.
